mapper.insert: INSERT INTO broker(cluster_name, broker_name, broker_id, address, version, dc, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{clusterName}, #{brokerName}, #{brokerId}, #{address}, #{version}, #{dc}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

INSERT INTO broker_consumer_group_xref(broker_id, consumer_group_id, create_time, update_time, sync_time) VALUES (#{brokerId}, #{consumerGroupId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) > 0 FROM broker WHERE cluster_name = #{clusterName} AND broker_name = #{brokerName} AND broker_id = #{brokerId}
SELECT id, cluster_name AS clusterName, broker_name AS brokerName, broker_id AS brokerId, address, version, dc, update_time AS updateTime FROM broker WHERE id = #{brokerId}

SELECT id, cluster_name AS clusterName, broker_name AS brokerName, broker_id AS brokerId, address, version, dc, update_time AS updateTime FROM broker WHERE 1 = 1
AND address = #{address}
